title: Introducing: Comic Con Meta Pod
itunes:title: Introducing: Comic Con Meta Pod
description:
Joelle Monique's got a new show! Tune in to Comic Con Meta*Pod to hear celebrity interviews and catch up on the nerd news headlines. Hosts Hector Navarro and Joelle Monique guide you through the convention experience of discovering something new and exciting around every corner of the con floor. Each week features an eclectic mix of entertainment such as trivia battles, deep dives into fandoms with experts, and music tracks from celebrities & themed bands. You'll find the best in every genre in the Comic Con Meta*Pod from sci-fi, video games, anime, comic books, film & television!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
